item.title: Testing Redux Combined Reducers
item.description: I have a few problems recently testing Redux reducers. The documentation is helpful but doesn’t match the rest of the tutorial. Simple Test Consider a basic reducer: export function tagFilter(state = [], action) { switch(action.type) { case 'TAG_FILTER': return [...state, action.tag] default: return state; } } The test for this is very simple. Call the function. Pass a state and an action. Expect the result: import expect from 'expect'; import {tagFilter} from '.
